attributes.action: Petition to give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: Is there anyone more deserving than a man who recently had a hip replacement raising £10,000,000 for the NHS and climbing.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore made the simple goal to raise £1,000 for the NHS by his 100th Birthday.  As he has just reached £10,096,382.42 we think that he deserves recognition for his WWII service and this amazing charity fundraising.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
